testcase.name: Event set_slug should assign downcase slug
Event set_slug should assign unique slug
Event positive_ratings_count should return 0 when there are no ratings
Event positive_ratings_count should return 0 when there are no positive ratings
Event positive_ratings_count should return 2 when there 2 positive ratings and 1 negative
Event check_date should return false if date is before today
Event check_date should return true if date is today
Event check_date should return true if date is after today
Event check_date should return false if date is not valid
Event average_ratings should return " - " if the event did not receive ratings
Event average_ratings should return 0 if the event receive a negative rating
Event average_ratings should return 5 if the event receive a neutral rating
Event average_ratings should return 10 if the event receive a positive rating
Event average_ratings should return 6 if the event receive 2 positive ratings, 1 neutral rating and a 1 negative rating
UrlShortener shorten should delegate to Googl
UrlShortener shorten should add slash if missing
UrlShortener for_default_url should take url from ENV
